tool_description: Compares the same scripture passage across multiple translations to highlight textual variations and interpretive differences.

reference.description: Scripture reference to compare across translations

translations.description: List of translation versions to compare

highlight_differences.description: Whether to highlight key differences between translations

include_original_language.description: Include original Hebrew/Greek text if available

comparison_format.description: Output format: side_by_side, sequential, or analysis

error_messages: Invalid reference: Provide a valid scripture reference in standard format.
Insufficient translations: Provide at least 2 translations for comparison.
Too many translations: Maximum 10 translations allowed for comparison.
Invalid translation: One or more specified translations are not supported.
Invalid comparison format: Use one of [side_by_side, sequential, analysis].
usage: Provide scripture reference and array of translation versions. Optionally enable difference highlighting and original language inclusion. Returns formatted comparison with analysis.

translation_texts.description: Array of passage texts from each translation

translation_names.description: Names of translations in same order as texts

comparison_summary.description: Summary of translation variations and implications
